comments.body: Using the `base` is fine IMO, as this is a development container anyway.
True. Just I guess need to document that this will be different from the regular dev env where it's in the pandas-dev branch.
Also, a downside of this is that I think it takes a lot longer (from anecdotal experience) to update the base env instead of creating a new one, but oh well not sure what else to do.
